subject: Casualties and losses
object: c. 6,000+ civilians (1973-1977), 4,376 civilians (since 2000) and 473 non-specified killed in Pakistan | c. 140,000 displaced (2004-2005)

subject: Casualties and losses
object: 3 Chinese civilians killed | 4 kidnapped | 5 oil tankers damaged
